Town Council
============

Physical Address:

101 S. Shady Shores Rd  
Shady Shores, TX 76208

Phone:

[(940) 498-0044](tel:9404980044)

[town.adminstrator@shady-shores.com](mailto:town.adminstrator@shady-shores.com)
